ESOFT offers a comprehensive range of programs including:
- Bachelor's Degrees (BSc, BBM)
- Higher National Diplomas (HND)
- Professional Certifications
- Diploma programs
- English language courses

You can explore all options at: https://esoft.lk/programs

We provide diverse academic pathways in:
1. Information Technology
2. Business Management
3. Engineering
4. English Studies
5. Professional Development

Visit our website for complete details on each program.

Our course catalog includes:
• British Degree Programs
• Pearson HND qualifications
• Specialized Diplomas
• Short Courses
• Industry Certifications

Which field are you interested in?

You can choose from:
- 3-4 Year Degree Programs
- 1-2 Year Diplomas
- 6 Month Certificates
- Flexible Short Courses

All designed with industry relevance and international standards.

ESOFT provides:
✓ Internationally recognized qualifications
✓ Career-focused programs
✓ Flexible study options
✓ Industry-aligned curriculum

Browse our full offerings at: https://esoft.lk/courses

patterns: What do I need to apply?
responses:
Admission requirements vary by program:

• Degrees: A/Ls with 3 passes or equivalent
• Diplomas: O/Ls with credit passes
• Certificates: Basic education

Specific requirements available at: https://esoft.lk/requirements

For most programs you'll need:
- Academic transcripts
- Identification documents
- Completed application
- Registration fee

Some programs may require interviews or placement tests.

Typical requirements include:
✓ Minimum educational qualifications
✓ English proficiency (for some programs)
✓ Completed application form
✓ Supporting documents

Contact admissions for program-specific details.

Entry depends on program level:

Undergraduate Degrees:
- A/Ls or equivalent
- Minimum grades vary

Diplomas:
- O/L completion

Professional Certificates:
- Basic education

To apply you generally need:
1. Academic certificates
2. National ID/passport
3. Passport photos
4. Application fee

Some programs have additional requirements.

patterns: How to sign up for courses?
How to become an ESOFT student?
responses:
The application process is simple:
1. Choose your program
2. Complete online application
3. Submit documents
4. Pay registration
5. Attend orientation

Start at: https://apply.esoft.lk

To enroll:
• Visit any ESOFT campus
• Meet with an advisor
• Complete application
• Submit requirements
• Pay fees
• Begin classes

Application steps:
✓ Program selection
✓ Form completion
✓ Document submission
✓ Fee payment
✓ Enrollment confirmation

We guide you through each step!

Our 5-step process:
1. Inquiry
2. Application
3. Assessment
4. Registration
5. Orientation

Contact us for personalized guidance.

You can apply:
- Online through our portal
- In-person at any campus
- Via authorized representatives

All methods lead to the same quality education!

patterns: What is the price of courses?
responses:
Our fee structure varies by program:

• Degrees: LKR 800,000 - 1,500,000
• Diplomas: LKR 200,000 - 500,000
• Certificates: LKR 50,000 - 150,000

Detailed breakdowns available upon request.

Program costs include:
- Tuition fees
- Registration
- Exam fees
- Resource fees

We offer flexible payment plans to suit your budget.

Approximate program costs:
✓ BSc Degrees: ~1.2 million LKR
✓ HND Programs: ~600,000 LKR
✓ Diplomas: ~300,000 LKR

Scholarships and installments available.

Education investment at ESOFT:
• Registration: LKR 20,000
• Semester fees: Varies by program
• Additional costs: Books, exams

We provide transparent pricing.

Our fees are competitive and include:
- Quality instruction
- Learning materials
- Student support
- Career services

Request a personalized quote today.

We accept:
• Cash payments
• Bank transfers
• Credit/debit cards
• Cheques
• Online payments

Installment plans available for most programs.

Payment options include:
- Full upfront payment (discount available)
- Semester-wise payments
- Monthly installments

Custom plans can be arranged.

You can pay via:
✓ Direct bank deposit
✓ Online payment gateway
✓ Credit card at campus
✓ Standing orders

We'll work with your financial situation.

Flexible payment solutions:
• 100% upfront (5% discount)
• 50% down + installments
• Equal monthly payments

Discuss options with our finance team.

Our payment methods:
1. Cash at campus
2. Bank transfers
3. Card payments
4. Online payments
5. Payment plans

All secure and convenient.

patterns: What are requirements for foreign students?
Can I study on a tourist visa?
responses:
We welcome international students! Requirements include:
- Valid student visa
- English proficiency (IELTS 6.0 or equivalent)
- Academic transcripts
- Medical insurance

Our international office assists with visas, accommodation and orientation.

For international applicants:
✓ Specialized visa guidance
✓ Airport pickup arrangements
✓ Cultural adaptation programs
✓ Dedicated international student support
✓ Global alumni network

Contact international@esoft.lk for personalized assistance.

We have over 40 campuses across Sri Lanka. Our main metro campus is in Colombo.
You can find our full branch network at: https://esoft.lk/locations
All ESOFT programs are accredited and recognized both locally and internationally.
We partner with leading universities and accreditation bodies to ensure quality education.
We provide comprehensive support including counseling, career guidance, and academic assistance.
Our student success center offers tutoring, mentoring, and personal development programs.
Our graduates enjoy excellent employment rates with career opportunities in growing industries.
We offer career counseling and industry placements to help launch your professional journey.
Our faculty includes industry experts and highly qualified academics with advanced degrees.
Lecturers are selected for both academic excellence and real-world professional experience.
We maintain strong partnerships with leading companies for internships and graduate placements.
Our curriculum is developed with industry input to ensure career-relevant skills.
Our campuses feature modern labs, libraries, study lounges, and high-tech classrooms.
Students enjoy access to cutting-edge technology and comfortable learning spaces.
We offer hostel facilities near major campuses and can recommend approved housing options.
Our accommodation office assists students in finding safe and convenient living arrangements.
Our alumni work at top companies worldwide and maintain an active professional network.
Many graduates have launched successful careers or continued to advanced studies.
Upon successful completion, you'll receive accredited certification recognized by employers.
All programs lead to formal qualifications - certificates, diplomas or degrees as applicable.
We offer diverse clubs from tech to arts, plus sports teams and leadership programs.
Student life includes competitions, cultural events, and professional development activities.
Timetables vary by program and are shared during orientation and via student portal.
Most full-time programs run weekdays 9am-4pm with some evening/weekend options available.
Assessment includes exams, projects, presentations and continuous evaluation methods.
Grading varies by course but typically combines exams (60%) and coursework (40%).
We use cutting-edge learning platforms, virtual labs, and industry-standard software.
Students access our LMS, video lectures, and digital library resources.
We offer English language support programs to help students succeed academically.
Language labs and tutoring are available to improve communication skills.
We offer transfer pathways to partner universities in the UK, Australia and other countries.
Many programs allow you to start at ESOFT and complete abroad - ask about articulation agreements.
Call us at +94 117 572 572, email info@esoft.lk, or message on WhatsApp +94 77 123 4567.
Visit https://esoft.lk/contact for all contact options and campus locations.
For emergencies, call campus security at +94 117 572 599 or local emergency services.
Contact the student welfare office immediately for urgent assistance during office hours.
We value your feedback! Submit via our online form or email feedback@esoft.lk.
All feedback is reviewed and helps us improve - thank you for sharing your thoughts.
You can browse our comprehensive FAQ section at: https://esoft.lk/faq
For quick answers to common questions, visit our help center online.
I'm sorry, I didn't understand that. Could you rephrase your question?
I want to help! Can you ask that in a different way?
I'm still learning. Could you try asking differently?
Let me connect you to a human advisor who can help with that.
